title: Analysis of MOOCs' Impact on Higher Education: Exploration Through Mixed Research Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners participate in online/offline integrated activities using personal devices (BYOD), conducting case analysis and discussion-based projects grounded in advanced social studies expertise

learning_goals: Participants can evaluate the educational effectiveness and limitations of MOOCs using mixed-methods research (quantitative/qualitative analysis)
Learners can derive factors influencing student engagement and attendance rates in MOOCs within higher education contexts
Participants can propose, through project deliverables, the impact of technological innovation on educational resource improvement

resources: Quantitative Data Analysis Tool (e.g., Google Analytics)
Survey Template for Collecting Qualitative Feedback

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
